string.value: Please refrain from using foul language in this game.
If you target another user for verbal or other forms of abuse within the game, your access to the game will be limited.
The gamemaster will never ask for password or any other form of personal information.
Please be careful not to let anyone else know your password.
If you find any bugs or have trouble playing the game, please check 'email us' at helpdesk on MapleStory website.
If you commit an illegal act within the game, your access to the game will be limited.
If you use any hacking programs or engage in any activity that may be deemed illegal, your access to the game will be limited.
You can use the system option at menu to change your sound settings.
Use the game option at menu to change settings for chatting, trade request, whisper, and others.
Type '/?' on the textbox to see a list of commands available by typing '/'.
If the cash equipment item is equipped on top of the regular equipment item, the abilities of the regular items will stay put.
To prevent hacking, you should think twice before opening an unknown attachment file from a messenger or an email.
Use HotKey's (I,E,S,K,W,M,R,H) to conveniently access all menus quickly.
To designate an item as a HotKey, drag the item onto the quick slot.
Look for hidden portals all around the map.
Press F1~F7 to make various facial expressions.
Use the portal on the field to move on to a different area.
The portals that allow you to move on to a different area will be displayed on the minimap as a blue dot.
Once you leave the Maple Island, there's no turning back.
Click on 'Detail' at stat window to take a detailed look at your character stats.
Other characters around you will be displayed on the minimap as red dots.
Stand still for a period of time to slowly regain health.
To pick up an item, press 'Z' or '0' on the number pad.
Press CTRL to attack, ALT to jump.
Go to stores to purchase equipments and potions necessary for your journey.
Once you have leveled up, go to the stat window to use your ability points acquired through leveling up.
Once you have made the 1st job advancement, you can't make another job adv. with a different job.
To equip an item, go to the equipment inventory and drag the item onto equipped items window or just double-click on it.
Press 'W' to look at the world map.
Press 'E' to look at the equipped items.
Press 'I' to take a look at the list of items you possess.
Press 'M' to look at the minimap.
Press 'K' to look at the skill window.
Press 'S' to look at your character stats.
To create a party, type '/makeparty' on the textbox.
If the party leader wants to invite a user to the party, type '/partyinvite character-name' on the textbox.
If the party leader wants to expel a party member, type '/partyexpel'.
To leave the party, type '/leaveparty'.
To look at your party's information, type '/partyinfo'.
If the party leader wants to invite a user to the party, right-click on the user to see 'Invite Party'.
To raise or drop someone's fame level, right-click on the user to see Fame +/-.
You can raise or drop someone's fame level once a day.
You can raise or drop a particular user's fame level once a month per user.
Everyone of the towns feature stores where you can purchase equipments and potions.
Some items have gender and job limitations. Please be aware of them before making a purchase.
Once you have made the 1st job advancement, you can't make another job adv. with a different job.
Please be aware of the fact that once you make the job adv., every death will cost you some EXP.
Through quests, you may be able to acquire items unavailable in stores.
More inventory slots are added once you make the job adv..
You won't be awarded with skill points if you decide not to make the job advancement at the appropriate level, and instead opt to level up.
Type '/trade character-name' to request a trade with a user.
To become a magician, make the job advancement at level 8. Otherwise, at level 10.
To create a party, type '/makeparty' on the textbox.
If the party leader wants to invite a user to the party, type '/partyinvite character-name' on the textbox.
If the party leader wants to expel a party member, type '/partyexpel'.
To leave the party, type '/leaveparty'.
To look at your party's information, type '/partyinfo'.
If the party leader wants to invite a user to the party, right-click on the user to see 'Invite Party'.
To raise or drop someone's fame level, right-click on the user to see Fame +/-.
You can raise or drop someone's fame level once a day.
You can raise or drop a particular user's fame level once a month per user.
Job advancements can be done at the guilds in each town.
Passive skills work automatically after acquiring them.
To use an active skill, drag it out of the skill window and place it over Quick Slot to designate it with a HotKey.
Each town sells their own, original set of equipment.
You won't be awarded with skill points if you decide not to make the job advancement at the appropriate level, and instead opt to level up.
After the job advancement, you'll be awarded with some skill points after every level up.
Skill points can be used at 'Skill' window.
Be careful of powerful monsters underneath the underground dungeon!
Defeat a powerful monster to acquire a rare item not found in stores.
The MP will slowly recover after a certain period of time.
The skills that require MP won¡¯t work if the Mana Points are used up.
Type '/trade character-name' to request a trade with a user.
Use the town-returning scrolls to return to a town much more easily.
The throwing stars don¡¯t disappear even after using them all up and reaching 0 in the process.
The throwing stars can be recharged at weapon stores in every town.
The 2nd job advancement is available at level 30 after the 1st job adv..
All skill points obtained until level 30 must be used towards skills related to the 1st job adv.
You need to use up all your skill points you've earned until level 30 in order to make the 2nd job adv.
Some skills are not used because it overlaps with other skills.
Use various scrolls to improve your weapons and armors.
There's a 24-Hr store available deep in the underground dungeon where you can purchase powerful potions not available in towns.
When making the 2nd job adv., the warrior need to choose one of these three jobs available: Fighter, Page, or Spearman.
When making the 2nd job adv., the bowman need to choose one of these two jobs available: Hunter or Crossbow man..
When making the 2nd job adv., the magician need to choose one of these two jobs available: Wizard or Cleric
When making the 2nd job adv., the thief need to choose one of these two jobs available: Assassin or Bandit
Some quests and items require a certain level of fame.
The 3rd job advancement is available at level 70 after the 2nd job adv..
It's best for you to use your skill points gained after level 70 AFTER the 3rd job adv.
You need to use up all your skill points you've earned until level 70 in order to make the 3rd job adv.
There are quests available that can be repeated even after clearing it the first time.
Use the sauna at Sleepywood Hotel to recover your HP and MP faster.
Among the 2nd level skills for magicians, some skills based on elements work best under monsters based on same elements.
The 4th job advancement is available at level 120 after 3rd job adv.
It's best for you to use your skill points gained after level 120 AFTER the 4th job adv.
You need to use up all your skill points you've earned until level 120 in order to make the 4th job adv.
